items.sentence: You know that I wouldn't be stupid enough to do that, don't you?
I don't know how to act my age. I've never been this old before.
Tom went out of his way to make their honeymoon truly memorable.
A fortune teller told me that I'd meet my future wife in Boston.
I've done all of my homework and I'd like to take a short break.
How long does it usually take you to get dressed in the morning?
Yesterday, I was reminded what it was I liked so much about Tom.
Tom doesn't like ironing, but he does sometimes iron his shirts.
What I like to eat the most are strawberries with whipped cream.
If we'd done what Tom asked us to do, we'd probably be dead now.
It's not that hard to understand why Tom didn't want to do that.
Another hunter accidentally killed Tom while he was out hunting.
Tom is the only one that would know the answer to that question.
Tom miraculously beat the odds and went into complete remission.
I realized that Tom wasn't laughing and wondered what was wrong.
Tom doesn't get along well with the other children in his class.
Whatever happened between Tom and me isn't any of your business.
He's a very romantic boyfriend who brings me flowers each night.
Tom's clarinet-playing has improved since I last heard him play.
There are many things in life that are more important than work.
